features.name: Authentication & Login (Backend)
features.description: Handles operator authentication, validates access window via optional AcessoValidator, optional Termo de Uso check, and issues JWT.

features.name: Operator Management (Backend)
features.description: CRUD for operators, including assigning profiles and units, enforcing unique login/CPF/email and required fields.

features.name: Profiles & Permissions
features.description: Profiles/roles management used to authorize modules visibility and actions.

features.name: Frontend Services & Types
features.description: TypeScript service layer and types for configuration and operators, using Axios to call backend APIs.

features.name: Frontend App & Layout
features.description: React app layout and routing, module visibility according to logged operator profiles.

features.name: E2E / System Tests (Node/Playwright)
features.description: Assorted JS test scripts to validate login, operator management, and module access (UPA etc.).

features.name: Gateway Service
features.description: Spring Cloud Gateway module (if used to route frontend/backend).

features.name: Dev Ops & Scripts
features.description: Scripts for DB setup, admin user, Cloudflare tunnel, and environment helpers.
